content.raw: I think @scpeters is assigned to this task (?). Either arat.world stays in gazebo and HaptixControlPlugin spawns a polhemus source and an arm model in the world, or we move arat.world to this repo and put polhemus_source and the apl arm in the world.
content.html: I think @scpeters is assigned to this task (?). Either arat.world stays in gazebo and HaptixControlPlugin spawns a polhemus source and an arm model in the world, or we move arat.world to this repo and put polhemus_source and the apl arm in the world.

pullrequest.title: using actual motor and sensor sizes (previously haptix.h enums)

content.raw:
currently
~~~
gazebo worlds/arat.world
~~~
and
~~~
gz model -f ./src/handsim_proprietary/apl_description/right_mpl_arm.urdf -m apl
~~~
segfaults due to missing `polhemus_source` model. I'll fix HaptixControlPlugin to not segfault here.
content.html:
currently

gazebo worlds/arat.world

and

gz model -f ./src/handsim_proprietary/apl_description/right_mpl_arm.urdf -m apl

segfaults due to missing polhemus_source model. I'll fix HaptixControlPlugin to not segfault here.
